channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.description:

item.title: Report X-2025020363
item.description:
Report X-2025020363

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-10T06:19:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-05
  • City: RENO
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package was found to be wet durning AM Sort. When the package was inspected they realize it had a stronge odor of fuel and this could be an undeclared DG package. The DG again then called DG Admin and was advised to hold the package for it being an undeclared. It was discovered after talking with receipent that this was an Air Craft part and it was most likely jet fuel that was leaking from this part. The package is being held.
